# ynabr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CircleCI build status](https://circleci.com/gh/bkkkk/ynabr.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/bkkkk/ynabr)
<!-- badges: end -->

Easily parse your financial services data to import it into YNAB and get your budget on!

## Installation

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("bkkkk/ynabr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ynabr)
## basic example code
```
